task.title: Create Adjustments
task.shortdesc: Manage Adjustments provides you the ability to update payments made to employees, calculate additional taxes due for the quarter, and report the information on the quarter-end returns.

context.p: Use the Create Adjustments page to select your employees requiring adjustments. Only employees your role is qualified to view appears from this page. Before creating adjustments, use the Add or Remove buttons to compile a list of employees requiring adjustments.

step.cmd: From the Create Adjustment page, select the quarter to which your adjustments will post.
Select Add. The Add Employees page appears.
Select each employee requiring an adjustment.
Select Finish. The employees are listed from the Create Adjustments page.
Select Create. A message appears indicating how many adjustments were created. Adjustment are created for every employee listed on this page.
